mapper.select: SELECT g.*, s.name AS stadiumName, t1.name_kr AS homeTeamName, t2.name_kr AS awayTeamName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diaries d WHERE d.game_id = g.game_id AND d.status = 'COMPLETED') AS diaryCount FROM games g LEFT JOIN stadiums s ON g.stadium_id = s.stadium_id LEFT JOIN teams t1 ON g.home_team_code = t1.team_code LEFT JOIN teams t2 ON g.away_team_code = t2.team_code WHERE DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY g.game_date ASC, g.game_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games ( season, game_type, game_date, game_time, dh_code, stadium_id, home_team_code, away_team_code, score_home, score_away, winning_team, status, cancel_reason, home_starter, away_starter, etc_info, mvp_player, data_source, created_at ) VALUES ( YEAR(#{gameDate}), 'REGULAR', #{gameDate}, #{gameTime}, '0', #{stadiumId}, #{homeTeamCode}, #{awayTeamCode}, IFNULL(#{scoreHome}, 0), IFNULL(#{scoreAway}, 0), CASE WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) > IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) THEN #{homeTeamCode} WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) > IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) THEN #{awayTeamCode} WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) = IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) THEN 'DRAW' ELSE NULL END, #{status}, #{cancelReason}, #{homeStarter}, #{awayStarter}, #{etcInfo}, #{mvpPlayer}, 'MANUAL', NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET season = YEAR(#{gameDate}), game_date = #{gameDate}, game_time = #{gameTime}, home_team_code = #{homeTeamCode}, away_team_code = #{awayTeamCode}, stadium_id = #{stadiumId}, score_home = #{scoreHome}, score_away = #{scoreAway}, winning_team = CASE WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) > IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) THEN #{homeTeamCode} WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) > IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) THEN #{awayTeamCode} WHEN #{status} = 'FINISHED' AND IFNULL(#{scoreHome},0) = IFNULL(#{scoreAway},0) THEN 'DRAW' ELSE NULL END, status = #{status}, etc_info = #{etcInfo}, home_starter = #{homeStarter}, away_starter = #{awayStarter}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, mvp_player = #{mvpPlayer}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE game_id = #{gameId}
mapper.select: SELECT stadium_id, name FROM stadiums ORDER BY name ASC
